question_en: Choose the correct reported speech: 'He said, "I am ready."'
question_ta: உரையாடலைப் பதிவுசெய்ய: 'He said, "I am ready."'
options_en: He said that he was ready.
He said that he is ready.
He said that I am ready.
He said that he had be ready.
answer_en: He said that he was ready.
answer_ta: He said that he was ready.

question_ta: இறுங்கியது 'analysis' என்பதற்கான பன்மை?

question_en: In the story, why did Don Quixote choose Sancho Panza as his squire?
question_ta: கதையில், டான் க்விக்க்ஸோட் தனது ஸ்குயர் ஆக சாஞ்சோ பான்சாவை ஏன் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கிறார்?

question_en: Pick the correct conjunction: 'I will go ___ it rains.'
question_ta: சரியான இணைப்பு: 'I will go ___ it rains.'

question_en: Identify the passive form: 'The police arrested the thief.'
question_ta: இதன் passive வடிவம் அடையாளம்: 'The police arrested the thief.'
options_en: The police were arrested by the thief.
The thief was arrested by the police.
options_ta: காவல் அதிகாரிகள் திருடன் கைது செய்தனர் என்று மாற்று
answer_en: The thief was arrested by the police.
answer_ta: The thief was arrested by the police.
